seo: VMware VCenter,CVE-2021-21972,未授权文件上传漏洞,漏洞检测
seo_en: VMware VCenter,CVE-2021-21972,Unauthorized File Upload Vulnerability,Vulnerability Detection
summary: 该插件用于检测VMware VCenter是否存在CVE-2021-21972未授权任意文件上传漏洞，通过发送特定请求并分析响应来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether VMware VCenter has the CVE-2021-21972 unauthorized arbitrary file upload vulnerability by sending specific requests and analyzing responses.
